# Ignore compiled Java class files
*.class

# Ignore compiled binary directories
bin/
out/

# Ignore logs
*.log
logs/

# Ignore IDE and editor folders
.idea/
.vscode/
*.iml

# Ignore build system folders (for Maven/Gradle, если будешь использовать позже)
target/
build/

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
